mapper.select: SELECT co.region, sa.company_name, co.brn, mem.name, mem.contract_date, SUM(sa.day_sales) AS total, mem.other FROM member mem JOIN company co ON mem.company_no = co.company_no JOIN sales sa ON co.company_name = sa.company_name GROUP BY co.region, sa.company_name, co.brn, mem.name, mem.contract_date, mem.other ORDER BY total
SELECT product_code, product_name, sale_price FROM product WHERE sub != '생지' ORDER BY product_code ASC
SELECT product_name ,sale_price FROM product WHERE sub = #{sub}
